page.title: 07EVENTS-2
page.content: This year there will be a dance instead. Each of 15 towns on The Island has a{CARNIVAL}and each queen goes on her float to each carnival. We have a reception for the queens afterwards. We never have enough helpers to collect the money. We have seven bands and majorettes . On the day he has to put the procession in order and to get the judges to choose the best group in each section. The {POLICE}like it to move at the right time. We spend all year meeting and planning but it is enjoyable on the day. One year we had a sandcastle competition but the tide washed them away before the judges arrived. Children who win the fancy dress get Â£5 but it might cost more than that to make the costume.
